name: 10_class
description: These are tasks that depend on a condition. You want to perform different asynchronous actions based on whether the condition is true or false. ### Callback > *To pass a function in another function as a **parameter**. Sequence wise task* Functions that are dependent on each other or one another Callbacks are a fundamental concept in JavaScript and TypeScript for handling asynchronous operations. Callbacks are functions that you pass as arguments to other functions, and they are executed when a particular operation is completed. In TypeScript, callbacks can be used to work with asynchronous code in a clean and organized manner.
